summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 7%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 5 mbar), light levels (up 5441 lux), and cloud levels (up 592 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1521 m), light levels (up 7711 lux), and rainfall (down 0.3 mm) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 591.9m lower than yesterday, 1071.0m lower than past week, 1520.9m lower than past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 860m minimum and 3110m maximum, with an average of 1281.5m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 2350m and 2800m.
cloud levels.summary: Expect mostly clear skies with high cloud.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, oppressively muggy and sticky. Showers, mostly clear skies with high cloud, and periods of sunshine are expected. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
